attributes.action: Any referendum on national independence from the UK must involve all nations.
attributes.additional_details: A single referendum of the UK electorate in it's entirety to vote either for dissolution, or independence for their county, English voters to vote for an independent England, Welsh voters for an independent Wales, Irish voters for an independent Ireland, and Scottish voters for an independent Scotland. No member of the UK to be allowed a several referendum.
attributes.background: Any referendum on the independence must involve all nations within the UK. The vote must be for the complete dissolution of the United Kingdom, or the independence of each country. All electoral members of the UK to have a right to vote.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
